TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MTLTexture_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Metal.IMTLTexture CreateTextureView (this Metal.IMTLTexture This, Metal.MTLPixelFormat pixelFormat, Metal.MTLTextureType textureType, Foundation.NSRange levelRange, Foundation.NSRange sliceRange);

.method public static hidebysig class Metal.IMTLTexture CreateTextureView(class Metal.IMTLTexture This, valuetype Metal.MTLPixelFormat pixelFormat, valuetype Metal.MTLTextureType textureType, valuetype Foundation.NSRange levelRange, valuetype Foundation.NSRange sliceRange) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
Docs.summary: Creates and returns a Metal texture that shares the same memory as the source object, but that is interpreted with the new pixel format.
